```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("rest_inspec")
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)

rest_inspec = 
  rest_inspec %>%
  select(
    dba, boro, cuisine_description, inspection_date, grade) %>%
  filter(  
    !is.na(grade),
    cuisine_description == "Chinese"
  ) %>%
  sample_n(5000)
  
```
